SpriteVertex2D(Vector3, Vector2, Vector4)

Initializes a new instance of the SpriteVertex2D struct with the specified position, texture coordinates, and color.

public SpriteVertex2D(Vector3 position, Vector2 texCoords, Vector4 color)

Parameters

position Vector3

The 2D position of the vertex (Z is used for layout depth).

texCoords Vector2

The texture coordinates of the vertex.

color Vector4

The color of the vertex as a vector with RGBA components.
